page.title: 08The Explosion!
page.content: One Friday night in February 1977, a strong smell of gas was noticed in{ {Astley Road}and the Gas Board were called out but could find nothing. At 2 am on Saturday there was a terrific explosion. A house across the road was burning furiously. The{emergency {services}arrived and worked all through the night clearing up. The street was evacuated and the families were cared for in{the Salvation Army} premises where they were given hot drinks. One old lady who lived nearby stayed all the time making tea for the policemen and firemen.The family whose house had exploded stayed with relatives for some time afterwards. Every gas pipe in Astley Road had to be renewed which took months to complete. No-one will forget that night in a hurry! This information came from Clare's Mum.
